title: The Secret Life of a Soccer Mom
overview: They cook, clean, drop off the kids at practice and tuck them in at night. They are the beloved soccer moms who gave up their careers to take care of their families. But with their husbands at work and their kids at school, what would these moms do if they were given the chance to experience their dream jobs? This series whisks stay-at-home moms away from their kitchens and living rooms and takes them right into fashion runways and Fortune 500 companies. After weeks of exhilarating thrills and unexpected opportunities, they are faced with a choice â€“ pursue a new career or return to the daily routine at home.
